amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to allow the Secretary to select eligible employees for the Executive Management Fellowship Program who represent or service rural areas, to whatever extent practicable.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
